long_description: A versatile and compact travel companion, the REI Stuff Convertible Tote works as lightweight hauler of your goods. When it's not needed, you can simply stuff it inside its own zip pocket. When open, it can be carried like a tote or worn as an ultralight backpack; both tote straps and pack straps can be stashed in a pocket when not in use. Top buckle closes the tote opening; mesh side pockets can stow a bottle or umbrella. Tote's nylon fabric is lightweight, durable and folds down small. When not needed, turn its inner zip pocket inside out, stuff in the REI Stuff Convertible Tote and zip the pocket closed: You end up with an easily stowed 7" x 7" x 3" packet.
short_description: A versatile and compact travel companion, the REI Stuff Convertible Tote works as lightweight hauler of your goods. When it's not needed, you can simply stuff it inside its own zip pocket.
